body: Hot anger, jealousy, and envy are but a few of the possible motivational forces for the enmity. The enmity of the outsider can't be ended until one of the parties has been slain. Determine the outsider randomly, and assume that it attacks the character (or plagues her life in some way) within 1d20 days.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Description/Flames
name: Flames
